title: dodging in normals then dodging a ranked within 10 hours should not give you the -10lp punishment.
body: I dodged a normal game last night because I forgot to lock in a champ and this morning I get in a ranked lobby where my teams draft didn't look too promising so I thought I'd rather lose 3 lp than the 14 lp I lose from a loss.  To my surprise I lost 10lp for dodging a normal earlier.  I agree that the time punishment should increase for dodging 2 games within a 10hr period but normal dodge then a ranked dodge should trigger a -3lp loss not a 10.

replies.body:
Lp gains and losses aren't fixed, so it makes sense that they would vary slightly. I can't say for sure, but it would kind of make sense to me for consecutive dodges to start taking more and more LP. 

You should hit up our game team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get their opinion on how exactly those LP adjustments are calculated.
